citation.article-title: Salinicoccus alkaliphilus sp. nov., a novel alkaliphile and moderate halophile from Baer Soda Lake in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, China.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Salinicoccus alkaliphilus sp. nov.
Salinicoccus alkaliphilus (N.L. fem. n. alkali alkali; Gr. adj. philos loving; N.L. masc. adj. alkaliphilus liking alkaline media)
Cells are cocci, 0.5-0.8 μm in diameter, occurring singly, in pairs, tetrads or clumps.
Non-motile.
Endospores are not formed.
Gram-positive and strictly aerobic.
Colonies are round, smooth and slightly convex with pinkish colour and no diffusible pigment.
Growth occurs at pH 6.5-11.5 (optimum at 9.5), at temperatures of 10.0-49.0 °C (optimum at 32 °C) and in media with 0-25.0% (w/v) NaCl [optimum at 10% (w/v) NaCl].
Catalase, oxidase and urease are positive.
H2S production, indole, methyl red and Voges-Proskauer tests are negative.
Aesculin is hydrolysed, whereas casein, starch, gelatin and Tweens 80, 60 and 20 are not.

Utilizes D-arabinose, D(­+)-melibiose, creatinine, aesculin, lactose, D-xylose, D-fructose, amylose, sorbose, D(+­)-α-melezitose, erythritol, inulin, meso-erythritol, trehalose, D-mannose, D-sorbitol, stachyose, ribose, mannitol, D-galactose, adonitol, D-cellobiose, glycogen, dulcitol and α-L-rhamnose as sole carbon and energy sources.
Acid is produced from D-glucose, but not from maltose, galactose, fructose, sucrose, D-arabinose, glycerol or D-xylose.
Nitrate is reduced.

The following compounds are utilized as sole nitrogen sources: polypeptone, yeast extract, DL-tryptophan, bacto-peptone, casitone, urea, L-proline, L-methionine, L-serine, L-arginine, L-alanine, L-threonine, L-histidine, sodium L-glutamate, L-ornithine, L-leucine, L-glycine, L-glutamic acid and DL-lysine.
Amino acids that are not utilized as sole nitrogen sources are L-asparagine, L-tyrosine, L-isoleucine and L-cysteine.
The DNA G+C content is 49.6 mol% (determined by thermal denaturation).
The predominant lipoquinone is MK-6; no other quinones are detected.
The assumed cell wall murein type is L- Lys-Gly5.
Isolated from Baer Soda Lake, China.
The type strain is strain T8T (=AS 1.2691T=JCM 11311T).
